title: Celtic's Liam Henderson training with Serie B side Bari
description: Celtic midfielder Liam Henderson is training with Serie B side Bari this week ahead of a possible move to Italy.
content: Henderson has only played once for Brendan Rodgers' side this season, coming on as a substitute in the 1-0 win over Dundee in October.Sky Sports News understands Celtic would listen to offers for the 21-year-old, who had two successful spells away from the club on loan in previous seasons.He joined Norwegian side Rosenborg in March 2015, during the heart of their domestic season, and returned to Celtic in June before heading out on a domestic loan to Hibernian.Henderson was part of the Hibs squad which won the 2016 Scottish Cup final, coming off the bench and delivering corner kicks which led to the equalising and winning goals.Bari are currently in fourth spot in Serie B, five points behind leaders Palermo at the halfway stage of the season.They are in the middle of their winter break and return to action at struggling Cesena on January 20.
